name: parting-shot
effect: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
With a parting threat, the user lowers
the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
